Warehouse Chief Yasheni: Ah ha! That must be it! If Master Toma sent you, then that must be it! You came here to become a Scavenger, right? If you've met Toma and carried out his work, then I think I can trust you. Here, I'll give you this. Take it to Warehouse Chief Alder over there. He'll test your talent and transfer you to the Scavenger class.
